#First Problem
```{r}

makeacheMatrix <- function(x = matrix()) {
    inv <- NULL
     set <- function(y){
         x <<- y
        inv <<- NULL
    }
    get <- function() x
    setin <- function(solveMatrix) inv <<- solveMatrix
   getin <- function() inv
    list(set = set, get = get, setin = setinv, getinv = getinv)
}
```


## 2nd Problem
```{r}
cachesolve <- function(x, ...) {
    inv <- x$getinv()
     if(!is.null(inv)){
         message("Cached Data")
         return(inv)
     }
     data <- x$get()
    inv <- solve(data)
     x$setinv(inv)
    inv      
 }
```
